sentences.en: A few dedicated doctors have fought for years to enlighten the profession.
sentences.cn: 一些有献身精神的医生多年来一直努力指导业内同仁。

sentences.en: A longing to enlighten her was strong in him.
sentences.cn: 他心里充满了想开导她的强烈欲望.

sentences.en: At last , we bring forward JW rule based on the enlighten idea.
sentences.cn: 采用启发式思想提出了jw准则,为K值 的选择提供依据.

sentences.en: Baldwin enlightened her as to the nature of the experiment.
sentences.cn: 鲍德温给她讲解了这个实验的性质。

sentences.en: Can you enlighten her on this subject?
sentences.cn: 对这个问题你能启发启发她 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can you enlighten me if I don't know why you did so?
sentences.cn: 如果我不知道你们为什么这样做,你能开导我 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can you enlighten me on this issue?
sentences.cn: 你能否在这个问题上指点我一番?

sentences.en: I like those TV programs which enlighten the viewer as well as entertain him.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢那些既使观众得到娱乐又使观众受到教育的电视节目.

sentences.en: If you know what is wrong with her, please enlighten me.
sentences.cn: 如果你知道她出什么问题了，请告诉我。

sentences.en: It is necessary to enlighten the ignorant.
Maybe it'll enlighten you in ways you never could have imagined.
sentences.cn: 或许能给你带来意想不到的启发呢?

sentences.en: Please favour [ enlighten ] me with your instructions.
Radio should enlighten the listener as well as entertain him.
sentences.cn: 无线电广播既要使听众得到娱乐也要使他受到教育.

sentences.en: Remember that it is you who refuse to enlighten me.
sentences.cn: 记住,你得负责任,因为你不肯跟我说老实话.

sentences.en: Rick: Haha. That's great. Then you're the right person to 1 enlighten me.
sentences.cn: 瑞克: 哈哈, 太棒了, 那你就是为我启蒙的正确人选了.

sentences.en: TV programs should enlighten the audience as well as entertainment.
sentences.cn: 电视节目既要使观众得到娱乐也要使他们得到启发.

words.tran_cn: 开明的；文明的；进步的；被启发的
使人领悟的；有启发作用的

trans.tran_en: to give someone more knowledge and greater understanding about something
